title: @Riot PLEASE dont put tentacles on reworked Evelynn !
body: Theres this video talking about some leaked information the main thing that really bothered me was about the tentacles apparently on eves back! what in the hell??! please dont go in that direction! i know to not take these sort of videos so seriously but what if im wrong?? and the leak is 100% accurate?? :(

replies.body: Putting enough faith in a leak to make stupid posts like this? You haven't even seen anything to do with Eve's rework. Chill the sod out.
Gotta admit Sharjo, I always enjoy your responses to these kinds of threads.

I fucking hate leaks man. Fucking hate 'em.

And people's blind faith in leaks. Fuck that too.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=B35rA40d,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-03-27T05:04:46.409+0000)
>

> And people's blind faith in leaks. Fuck that too.


Because 90% of the times they are correct.

Because they ruin surprises and big upcoming reveals, set expectations, often for the worse, and lead to a lot of overblown reactions from the community.

Plus they're fucking meaningless anyway considering someone potentially lost their job to provide information that was gonna happen anyway.

Leaks are shite. At least in the case of League.

I don't think they ruin surprises, but they actually build hype for them. That's why some times developers even do intentional leaks.

And if someone really were stupid enough to lose their job to write a leak on Reddit, it's only their own fault. I mean, people make mistakes, but.... a good job vs reddit?
I'm 100% down for tentacles on eve's back. The internet is gonna have a blast with rule 34.

I'm fine with it. They don't have to be fully visible, so they could add to her unsettling air, like there's something more waiting in the dark. She could use them to drag people in and stab at them, or they could go in a tokyo ghoul direction, with spiky tendrils coming out of her.

I think it could be an interesting direction. Keep an open mind :)

Uggghh.  There's no 'tentacles'... that's just ridiculous.
They probably mistook the flowing ribbons of fabric on her cuffs for tentacles.

leak is obviously fake

clearly someone made it up
Stop thinking of the  tentacles as tantacles think of them more like Spikes that come from her back.

Forgive me that I'm being a bit lazy here, but I'm gonna copy my response to a similar thread:

> Assuming that so-called "leak" is indeed true, said 'tentacles' are probably more like Yorick's cape of the Mist, rather than something like Illaoi's/Nagakaborous' or Vel'Koz's tentacles.

> That said, nothing about this "leak" (as far as I've seen) doesn't make it any more plausible or real than other posts whose writers claim them to be actual leaks, so take it with a grain of salt.

> ######And popular YouTubers promoting these posts or the Reddit upvotes mass don't raise its plausibility of being real, of course (See: _Izuna/ Thoridus/ Katarina's Gameplay Update details/ Xerath's Ultimate skin,_ etc).
Don't trust everything you read on the internet, especially anything posted on Reddit.
If the leak is real...you don't even know what it looks like or how it is implemented. Lawd have mercy.
